pullrequest.title: [Acropolis] Assign friction coefficients from collision elements

content.raw:
Surface friction isn’t really unique to ODE, so it would make sense in the long term to update SDF so that friction parameters aren’t buried inside of ODE-specific tags. This seems fine as a stopgap, though.

One thing I wonder: Is a friction coefficient of 10 necessary? I know COF can go higher than 1.0, but my intuition is that 10 is somewhat extreme. I’m fine with merging this either way, but for the sake of plausibility, I’d recommend a value closer to 1.0 unless 10 is actually plausible and/or necessary for some reason.
